exceptions.tactic: pose (Build_Monotonicity L minL Gamma prodp (prodp_mono L minL Gamma prodp)).
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language minL : MinimumLanguage L Gamma : Provable L minAX : MinimumAxiomatization L Gamma prodp, funcp : expr -> expr -> expr Adj : Adjointness L Gamma prodp funcp x, y1, y2 : expr H : |-- y1 --> y2 The term "L" has type "Language" while it is expected to have type "expr".

original: intros x y1 y2 H. pose (Build_Monotonicity L minL Gamma prodp (prodp_mono L minL Gamma prodp)). pose (Adj L Gamma prodp funcp x y1 y2 H). eauto.
